SELECT eham.sys_id sysId, epm.package_name packageName, eham.hr_total_count hrTotalCount, se.entity_name entityName, ub.full_name fullName, eham.amount, eham.creation_time creationTime FROM entity_hr_appointment_main eham LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm ON epm.sys_id = eham.package_id LEFT JOIN sys_entity se ON se.entity_id = eham.entity_no LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = eham.create_by WHERE 1 = 1 AND eham.is_deleted = 0
AND eham.sys_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT eham.sys_id sysId, eham.entity_no entityNo, eham.hr_total_count hrTotalCount, eham.hr_rest_count hrRestCount, ub.full_name fullName, ub.head_image headImage, ub.chinese_spell chineseSpell, ub.user_id userId FROM entity_hr_appointment_detail ehad LEFT JOIN user_basic ub ON ub.user_id = ehad.user_id LEFT JOIN entity_hr_appointment_main eham ON eham.sys_id = ehad.main_id WHERE 1 = 1 AND ehad.is_transfered = 1
AND ehad.main_id = #{params.sysId}

SELECT om.order_no, om.reference_no, om.hr_oppointment_id, om.order_cates, om.user_id, eham.sys_id, eham.entity_no, eham.package_id, count(oa.appointment_cates=3) baseCheckNum, count(om.order_cates=4) extensionCheckNum, count(oa.appointment_cates=5) familyDoctorNum, count(oa.appointment_cates=6) greenChannelNum FROM entity_hr_appointment_main eham LEFT JOIN order_main om on eham.sys_id = om.hr_oppointment_id LEFT JOIN order_appointment oa on om.order_no = oa.order_no WHERE eham.entity_no = #{params.entityId}
AND eham.sys_id = #{params.hrOppointmentId}

SELECT sum(eham.hr_total_count) total FROM entity_hr_appointment_main eham WHERE eham.entity_no = #{params.entityId}
AND eham.sys_id = #{params.hrOppointmentId}
SELECT eham.entity_no, eham.sys_id, epm.package_name FROM entity_hr_appointment_main eham LEFT JOIN exam_package_main epm on eham.package_id = epm.sys_id WHERE eham.entity_no = #{params.entityId}
